name: Revenge Space
description:
They attacked without warning. A vast alien armada desimating your homeworld. Your family were wiped out in the first attack. Word reaches you off world. You steal a ship and join the resistance, with one thought on your mind. Revenge!

FEATURES:
- Play on your Watch or Phone
- 5 space craft to unlock
- Boss fights!
- Retro pixel art
- Epic space battles
- Global leaderboard for Watch and Phone!
- Automatic weapon firing
- Revenge!

How to play:
Turn the crown up and down to move your spacecraft.
